name: WordPress Genially Embed
author: genially

sections.description:
WordPress Genially Embed plugin is an useful and convenient plugin to add Genially iframes to your WordPress website without coding knowledge.
WordPress Genially Embed plugin has some useful features that you’ll need. Here are the features of our WordPress Genially Embed plugin.

Features of WordPress Genially Embed plugin

  • Easy install and use
  • WordPress Genially Embed plugin works perfectly with all modern versions of WordPress
  • Ability to add geniallys on pages and posts using a block or a shortcode
  • User friendly back-end for WordPress Genially Embed plugin
  • Tested on popular WordPress themes

If you found any bug in our Genially Embed plugin or have a question contact us at blog@genially.com.

Adding Genially in posts/pages

Just add a new block and click on the Genially icon.

Then type the Genially URL or ID at the right sidebar. For example if you want to add this genially https://view.genial.ly/63da5c6878978a00174e9b27 you need to insert the whole URL or 63da5c6878978a00174e9b27.

If you found any bug in our Genially Embed plugin or have a question contact us at blog@genially.com.
sections.installation:
First of all download our WordPress Genially Embed plugin ZIP file.

Installing the WordPress Genially Embed plugin

  1. First log in to your website admin panel.
  2. Then go to Plugins page Add New > Upload Plugin.
  3. Click “Choose file” then select Genially Embed plugin zip file.
  4. Install and activate the plugin.

That’s all, now you can insert Genially iframes in your posts, pages. If any problem occurs, contact us at blog@genially.com.
sections.faq:
Our WordPress Genially Embed plugin is user friendly, but here are some frequently asked questions that can help you.

How to add Genially iframe in this Version?

You can choose the block «Genially» and include there the URL or ID of the Genially you want to embed.

If you are using Classic Editor just need to click on «Add your Genially» shortcode button, type only the «Genially URL or ID» and click on «Insert Genially».

Also you can always add the shortcode [wpgenially] and include inside the content of the shortcode the ID or URL in this way: [wpgenially]genially url or ID[/wpgenially]

Anyway, Genially is embed friendly so, in many cases, if you copy the url in your content, the iframe will appear as other embed services do (like YouTube).

How to obtain the iframe code of your Genially?

The iframe code is one of the available options to share a genially once it is published.

To get it, just click on the “Share” button located in the top right-hand corner of the Genially Editor. Then select the “Insert” tab and you’ll see 2 codes, the iframe and the script. Click on the copy button beside the iframe code to copy it.

short_description: Genially Embed plugin is an convenient tool for adding iframes geniallies to your website. Use Genially Embed plugin to add Genially in posts/pages.
